scripts.device:ios: xcrun simctl list devices booted | grep -o '[A-F0-9-]\{36\}' | head -1
scripts.device:android: adb devices | grep -v 'List' | grep 'device$' | awk '{print $1}' | head -1
scripts.statusbar:ios: DEVICE_ID=$(bun run device:ios) && xcrun simctl status_bar $DEVICE_ID override --time '9:41' --batteryState charged --batteryLevel 100 --cellularMode active --cellularBars 4 --wifiBars 3
scripts.statusbar:android: adb shell settings put global sysui_demo_allowed 1 && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command clock -e hhmm 0941 && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command battery -e level 100 -e plugged false && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command network -e wifi show -e level 4 && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command notifications -e visible false && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command enter
scripts.maestro:ios: bun run statusbar:ios && DEVICE_ID=$(bun run device:ios) && maestro --device $DEVICE_ID test .maestro/app-flow.yaml
scripts.maestro:android: bun run statusbar:android && DEVICE_ID=$(bun run device:android) && maestro --device $DEVICE_ID test .maestro/app-flow.yaml
scripts.maestro:all: bun run maestro:ios && bun run maestro:android
scripts.test:e2e: bun run maestro:all && bun run vrt:run
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
